value.title: Power BI Goals - Create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to the Power BI Goals Step by Step Beginner tutorial series, During this session, we will talk about how to create Scorecard and Manual Goals in Power BI. value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
